original_text: But they did not listen to Moses. Some left part of it till the morning, and it bred worms and stank. And Moses was angry with them.
korean_text: 그들이 모세에게 순종하지 아니하고 더러는 아침까지 두었더니 벌레가 생기고 냄새가 난지라 모세가 그들에게 노하니라

sentences.original_text: But they did not listen to Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 모세의 말을 듣지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Some left part of it till the morning
and it bred worms and stank.
And Moses was angry with them.
